# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value of your business operations. Given its high worth to you at $15000, I propose an offer to acquire it from you at a price reflecting its true value and my commitment to providing exceptional quality. My offer is $14000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows us to collaborate effectively, leveraging your expertise while contributing to your financial goals. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
